sections.title: Verse 1
content: Alleluia! sing to Jesus! His the scepter, his the throne;
Alleluia! his the triumph, his the victory alone;
Hark! The songs of peaceful Zion thunder like the seas abroad,
Alleluia! alleluia! let the church proclaim his word!

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Alleluia! not as strangers are we left in sorrow now;
Alleluia! he is near us, faith believes, nor questions how;
Through the cloud and through the shadow, through the waters, on we go;
Alleluia! alleluia! alleluia! let us go!

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Alleluia! bread of heaven, here on earth our strength renew;
Alleluia! here the armor to the faithful soul is true;
Alleluia! bread of angels, food to pilgrims here below,
Alleluia! alleluia! alleluia! mercy show!

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Alleluia! king eternal, thee the Lord of lords we own;
Alleluia! born of Mary, earth thy footstool, heaven thy throne;
Thou within the veil hast entered, robed in flesh our great High Priest,
Alleluia! alleluia! alleluia! eternal peace!

sections.title: Verse 5
content: Alleluia! sing to Jesus! Unto Christ the Lord acclaim;
Alleluia! highest glory to the Father, Son, and Flame;
Evermore and evermore sing the praises of his name,
Alleluia! alleluia! alleluia! praise the Lamb!
